description: This file contains the implementation of the UserService class, which handles user registration, credential validation, and retrieval by ID within the application layer of a notes backend system.

classes.name: UserService
classes.description: Implements user registration, credential validation, and retrieval functionalities, adhering to the IUserService interface.

methods.name: RegisterAsync
methods.description: Registers a new user with email, display name, and password, after ensuring the email isn't already registered.

methods.name: ValidateCredentialsAsync
methods.description: Validates user login credentials by checking email existence and password correctness.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a user by their unique identifier.
